text: Sila Rabbiin bishaan (rooba) samii irraa buusee, ergasii burqaa godhee dachii keessa gadi isa liccisiise hin agarree? Ergasii isaan (bishaaniin) midhaan bifti isaa gara garaa biqilchee, ergasii goggogee daalacha taâ€™u argitaErgasii caccabaa godhaDhugumatti, kana keessa warra sammuu qabaniif gorsatu jira
